organizations: Manchester United of Englands Premier League
lead_paragraph: Manchester United of England’s Premier League said yesterday that it was seeking to give Freddy Adu a trial soon. Adu, a highly acclaimed 17-year-old, plays for D.C. United, which has been eliminated from the Major League Soccer playoffs.
